Subject: Build a Public Folder Report for Exchange Online
Description:
Hello, 

We currently have a public folder report setup for our Exchange On-Prem environment, but we have recently migrated our public folders to exchange online. We'd like some guidance on how to repoint this folder to point to EXO instead of Exchange On-Prem. Thanks
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Looking to create a report that pulls data from Exchange online for the Publics folder
What_We_Know__c:
Customer is looking to re-create a report for their Exchange Online version of their public folder


Today we:

Reviewed the configurations for the EXO Public Report detailed in the documentation below:

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Solutions/Exchange/PublicFolders/Recommended.htm

Recommended verifying that the dependencies listed in the document above are installed on the NEA application server. 

Verified that the ADI and Entra ID jobs successfully ran.

Verified the host list is set to localhost. 

Recommend checking the MAPI-Based Permissions as well. 

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Requirements/Solutions/Exchange/MAPI.htm
Next_Steps__c:
Our next steps are:

You will:

Check dependencies and permissions and attempt to run the job once more
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom

We currently have a public folder report setup for our Exchange On-Prem environment, but we have recently migrated our public folders to exchange online. We'd like some guidance on how to repoint this folder to point to EXO instead of Exchange On-Prem.

Looking to create a report that pulls data from Exchange online for the Publics folder

Cause

Job was not located within the EXO group. 

Resolution

Relocated the Public Folders Job to the EXO group.
